section.p: The medications section shall contain a description of the relevant medications for the patient, e.g. an ambulatory prescription list. It shall include entries for medications as described in the Entry Content Module.

ol.li: Conforms to CCD Medications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.8)

SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Medication (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7)
Conforms to CCD Medications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.8)
[CCD] CONF-300, CONF-301: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC 2.26)

[CCD] Contains [0..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24)

[CCD] Contains [0..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Supply Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.34)

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Medication (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.7)
[CCD] CONF-299: SHALL satisfy: The absence of known medications is explicitly asserted.
[CCD] CONF-303: SHOULD satisfy: Valued with a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'medication'.

[CCD] CONF-298: SHOULD satisfy: Clinical statements include one or more Medication Activity and/or one or more Supply Activity.
[OCL]: self.getSubstanceAdministrations()->exists(activity : cda::SubstanceAdministration | activity.oclIsKindOf(ccd::MedicationActivity)) or self.getSupplies()->exists(activity : cda::Supply | activity.oclIsKindOf(ccd::SupplyActivity))
